mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK ( PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO, PRODUCTION_CODE, PDT_CODE, REMAINING_QTY, PRODUCTION_DATE, LOT_NO, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK.NEXTVAL, #{productionCode}, #{pdtCode}, #{remainingQty}, TO_DATE(#{productionDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{lotNo}, #{createdBy}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO, PRODUCTION_CODE, PDT_CODE, REMAINING_QTY, PRODUCTION_DATE, LOT_NO FROM PRODUCTS_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK WHERE PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode} ORDER BY PRODUCTION_DATE ASC, PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO ASC

SELECT PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO, PRODUCTION_CODE, PDT_CODE, REMAINING_QTY, PRODUCTION_DATE, LOT_NO FROM PRODUCTS_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK WHERE PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode} AND TO_NUMBER(REMAINING_QTY) > 0 ORDER BY PRODUCTION_DATE ASC, PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTS_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK SET REMAINING_QTY = TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(REMAINING_QTY) - TO_NUMBER(#{deductQty})), UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK_NO = #{productionReceiptStockNo} AND TO_NUMBER(REMAINING_QTY) >= TO_NUMBER(#{deductQty})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(TO_NUMBER(REMAINING_QTY)), 0) FROM PRODUCTS_PRODUCTION_RECEIPT_STOCK WHERE PDT_CODE = #{pdtCode} AND TO_NUMBER(REMAINING_QTY) > 0
